data.message: I'd so love it if the caffeine free option became more readily available (from someone who loves coke but can't drink caffeine for health reasons)

replies.message: well seen as the caffine is onl a flavouing im pretty sure your ok its not actual caffine.
Gold can is  diet and caffine free mkst supermarkets sell it

Yeah I use the gold one but what I mean is I'd love if I could get it in a pub and things like that it's still not often in my local supermarkets so I order online mostly if I want it.... 

Street Wear I know for sure that I'm NOT OK with the caffeine I know some ppl who are caffeine sensitive who can't handle coffee/energy drinks but can handle coke but I am extremely sensitive so can literally only have 3 sips of it before I get ill ....... that is unless I am having opposite symptoms where I need to drink excessive caffeine and fluids so drink loads of coke and energy drinks along with my water
